Adventurer Helper:
The vicinity of Aden, are the famous Hot Springs. Of these, extract the healing mineral water. It helps even in severe disease. Valderal decided to start trading with the water, but its people now and then attack the monsters that live near the spring. Monsters for some reason decided that the workers want to harm them.
Cut Cubs Drakolova Hot Springs, Hot Springs buffalo, Flowers Hot Springs, Hot Springs Horrible Scum, Antelope Hot Springs, Hot Springs Nepentisov, Hot Springs Yeti, Scum Hot Springs, Hot Springs Drakolovov and Grendel Hot Springs , and type in 40 vessels water from hot springs . You did manage, is not it?
